Package ezxpns.GUI

Interface Summary
RecordListView.RecordEditor The GUI Editor that manages the user side inputs for editing of a Record
UpdateNotifyee Notify the other UI components
Invoked when user performs an action that modifies data
 

Class Summary
Calculator A singleton class to evaluate equations using javascript
CardLayoutDemo  
CategoryModel A model used to display list of category in category frame
CategoryTargetPanel Panel for users to manage user-defined Categories as well as tagged Targets
Generated by WindowBuilder
Config Default Configurations for GUI Component
ExpenseForm Panel to contain and maintain the form for a new expense record
EzNavigator Navigator for the MainGUI
HomeScreen Marked for removal
IncomeForm GUI Form for Income records
LayeredPaneWithOverlap  
LogoIcon The Logo Object
MainGUI  
MultiRecDisplay MultiRecordDisplay - A GUI Component to be able to display lists of records effectively
MyDemo  
OverviewPanel This is the overview a.k.a summary panel that display the user's balance, in and out cash flow.
PieChart  
RecordDialog This is a JFrame object (Window) that allows users to enter a new record (Expense/Income) into the EzXpns
RecordForm  
RecordListView A packaged listView (actually JTable) that displays records
RecordsDisplayPanel Panel Class containing the inner workings of the Records' bit on the main screen
ReportFrame The window to handle all the extensive record analysis and report
Should contain a form for the user to enter the starting and the ending date of the records analysis
SavingsOverviewPanel The Savings Panel for the home screen - to display the Needs-Wants-Savings Ratio
SearchPanel The window to handle the searching and querying needs of the user
SimpleBarChart  
TargetOverviewPanel This is the panel in which will be slotted into the MainGUI (the main interface) as the display for the visual breakdown of the targets on the user defined categories (Food, Transport, etc...)
tzReportData  
UIControl To assist EzXpns in managing all the GUI Windows
UINotify Utility to do Minor Notification Messages
To display responses to users when they perform an action,
namely - Adding new data, editing existing data, removing existing data.
UndoManager A wrapper that allows one to easily add/perform undo actions
 

Exception Summary
Calculator.EvaluationException
